verses.verse: Now <WG1161> the feast <WG1859> of unleavened bread <WG106> drew nigh <WG1448>, which <WG3588> is called <WG3004> the Passover <WG3957>.

And <WG2532> the chief priests <WG749> and <WG2532> the scribes <WG1122> sought <WG2212> how <WG4459> they might put him <WG846> to death <WG337>; for <WG1063> they feared <WG5399> the people <WG2992>.

And <WG2532> they were glad <WG5463>, and <WG2532> covenanted <WG4934> to give <WG1325> him <WG846> money <WG694>.
And <WG2532> he consented <WG1843>, and <WG2532> sought <WG2212> opportunity <WG2120> to deliver <WG3860> him <WG846> unto them <WG846> in the absence of <WG817> the multitude <WG3793>.
And <WG1161> the day <WG2250> of unleavened bread <WG1722> came <WG2064>, on which <WG3739> the passover <WG3957> must <WG1163> be sacrificed <WG2380>.
And <WG2532> he sent <WG649> Peter <WG4074> and <WG2532> John <WG2491>, saying <WG2036>, Go <WG4198> and make ready <WG2090> for us <WG2254> the passover <WG3957>, that <WG2443> we may eat <WG5315>.
And <WG1161> they said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Where <WG4226> wilt thou <WG2309> that we make ready <WG2090>?

for <WG1063> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, <WG3754> I shall not <WG3765> eat <WG5315> it <WG2193>, until it be fulfilled <WG4137> in <WG1722> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316>.

for <WG1063> I <WG3756> say <WG3004> unto you <WG3754>, I <WG3756> shall not <WG3361> drink <WG4095> from henceforth of <WG575> the fruit <WG1081> of <WG575> the vine <WG288>, until <WG2193> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> shall come <WG2064>.

But ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> they that <WG3588> have continued <WG1265> with <WG3326> me <WG1700> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> temptations <WG3986>;

that <WG2443> ye may eat <WG2068> and <WG2532> drink <WG4095> at <WG1909> my <WG3450> table <WG5132> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> kingdom <WG932>; and <WG2532> ye shall sit <WG2523> on <WG1909> thrones <WG2362> judging <WG2919> the twelve <WG1427> tribes <WG5443> of Israel <WG2474>.
1161, 2962, Exodus36 Simon <WG4613>, Simon <WG4613>, behold <WG2400>, Satan <WG4567> asked <WG1809> to have you <WG5209>, that he might sift <WG4617> you as <WG5613> wheat <WG4621>:

but <WG1161> I <WG1473> made supplication <WG1189> for <WG4012> thee <WG4675>, that <WG2443> thy <WG4675> faith <WG4102> fail <WG1587> not <WG3361>; and <WG2532> do thou <WG4218>, when once thou <WG4771> hast turned again <WG1994>, establish <WG4741> thy <WG4675> brethren <WG80>.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Lord <WG2962>, with <WG3326> thee <WG4675> I am <WG1510> ready <WG2092> to go <WG4198> both <WG2532> to <WG1519> prison <WG5438> and <WG2532> to <WG1519> death <WG2288>.

But <WG1161> he denied <WG720>, <WG846> saying <WG3004>, Woman <WG1135>, I know <WG1492> him <WG846> not <WG3756>.

And <WG2532> the Lord <WG2962> turned <WG4762>, and looked <WG1689> upon Peter <WG4074>. And <WG2532> he <WG4074> went <WG1831> out <WG1854>, and wept <WG2799> bitterly <WG4090>.

and <WG1161> if <WG1437> I2065, 2532 ask <WG2065> you <WG611>, ye will not3361, 3756 answer <WG611>.
